title: Charlie Chaplin. Vol. 03
brief_description: This compilation video features four of Charlie Chaplin’s short films. “Easy street”: Charlie becomes a policeman and imposes his own brand of order on chaotic Easy Street. “The Immigrant”: Charlie meets a beautiful girl on board a ship. After many hilarious hardships they rescue each other and live happily ever after. “The Cure”: Our hero deposits the contents of his liquor bottle into the curative spa at a Sanatorium. “The Adventurer”: The hectic experiences of an escaped convict, with Charlie starring as the convict.
